hero.title: Share Your Vision with the World
hero.subtitle: Discover, share, and get inspired by stunning photography from creators around the globe. Join the most vibrant visual community.

features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: Your Photography
features.description: From high-quality uploads to powerful discovery tools, we provide everything you need to share your vision and connect with fellow photographers.

highQuality.title: High-Quality Uploads
highQuality.description: Upload photos up to 100MP with lossless compression. Your work deserves to be seen in its full glory.

smartDiscovery.title: Smart Discovery
smartDiscovery.description: Our AI-powered algorithm helps your photos reach the right audience and get discovered by people who appreciate your style.

globalCommunity.title: Global Community
globalCommunity.description: Connect with photographers from around the world. Share techniques, get feedback, and grow together.

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Track your photo performance, understand your audience, and see how your work impacts the community.

licensing.title: Easy Licensing
licensing.description: Monetize your work with our simple licensing system. Set your prices and earn from your photography.

collections.title: Smart Collections
collections.description: Organize your work into beautiful collections. Create stories and showcase your photography journey.

trending.title: Trending
trending.subtitle: Discover the most popular photos from our community this week

categories.title: Explore by
categories.subtitle: Find inspiration across different photography styles and subjects

testimonials.title: Loved by
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community has to say about their experience

sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.content: Pixinity has transformed how I share my work. The community is incredibly supportive and the platform makes my photos look stunning.

marcus.name: Marcus Rodriguez
marcus.content: The discovery algorithm is amazing. My photos are reaching audiences I never thought possible. It's like having a personal gallery curator.

elena.name: Elena Kowalski
elena.content: I've tried many platforms, but Pixinity truly understands photographers. The quality, community, and tools are unmatched.

cta.title: Ready to Share Your
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of photographers who are already showcasing their work and building their audience on Pixinity.

hero.title: About
hero.description: We're on a mission to democratize photography and create the world's most inspiring visual community. Every day, we help photographers share their vision, connect with others, and turn their passion into success.

mission.title: Our
mission.description1: We believe that every photographer, regardless of their experience level or background, deserves a platform where they can share their work, learn from others, and build meaningful connections within the creative community.
mission.description2: Pixinity isn't just a photo-sharing platform—it's a movement to celebrate visual storytelling, foster creativity, and make photography accessible to everyone, everywhere.

goals.democratizing: Democratizing access to photography tools and community
goals.supporting: Supporting photographers at every stage of their journey
goals.building: Building bridges between cultures through visual storytelling

values.title: Our
values.subtitle: These core principles guide everything we do and shape the community we're building together.

passion.title: Passion for Photography
passion.description: We believe photography is more than capturing moments—it's about telling stories, evoking emotions, and connecting people across cultures.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Our platform is built by photographers, for photographers. Every feature is designed to help our community grow, learn, and succeed together.

innovation.title: Innovation & Quality
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible, creating tools and experiences that empower photographers to reach their full potential.

accessibility.title: Global Accessibility
accessibility.description: Photography is a universal language. We're committed to making our platform accessible to creators everywhere, regardless of background or location.

team.title: Meet Our
team.subtitle: We're a diverse group of photographers, designers, engineers, and dreamers united by our love for visual storytelling.

sarahChen.name: Sarah Chen
sarahChen.bio: Award-winning photographer with 15+ years of experience. Former National Geographic contributor.

alexRodriguez.name: Alex Rodriguez
alexRodriguez.bio: Tech visionary who previously led engineering teams at Adobe and Google. Passionate about creative tools.

mayaPatel.name: Maya Patel
mayaPatel.bio: Documentary photographer and community builder. Dedicated to fostering inclusive creative spaces.

davidKim.name: David Kim
davidKim.bio: Award-winning UX designer with a background in visual arts. Believes in design that empowers creativity.

timeline.title: Our
timeline.subtitle: From a small startup to a global community—here are the key milestones that shaped Pixinity.

2019.title: Pixinity Founded
2019.description: Started with a vision to democratize photography sharing

2020.title: 10K Photographers
2020.description: Reached our first major community milestone

2021.title: Mobile App Launch
2021.description: Brought Pixinity to iOS and Android platforms

2022.title: 1M Photos Shared
2022.description: Celebrated one million photos uploaded to our platform

2023.title: Global Expansion
2023.description: Launched in 50+ countries with localized experiences

2024.title: AI-Powered Features
2024.description: Introduced smart tagging and discovery algorithms

cta.title: Ready to join our
cta.subtitle: Become part of a community that celebrates creativity, supports growth, and believes in the power of visual storytelling.
